m:MaterialTitle.title: Alignment
m:MaterialTitle.description: We have easy to use addStyleNames or classnames to help you align your content.
Vertical Align - You can easily vertically center things by adding the class valign-wrapper to the container holding the items you want to vertically align.

g:HTMLPanel.pre: <m:MaterialPanel addStyleNames="valign-wrapper"> <m:MaterialLabel fontSize="2em" addStyleNames="valign center" text="This should be vertically aligned"/> </m:MaterialPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.description: Text Align - These classes are for horizontally aligning content. We have .left-align, .right-align and .center-align

g:HTMLPanel.pre: <m:MaterialLabel fontSize="2em" addStyleNames="left-align" text="This should be left aligned"/> <m:MaterialLabel fontSize="2em" addStyleNames="right-align" text="This should be right aligned"/> <m:MaterialLabel fontSize="2em" addStyleNames="center-align" text="This should be center aligned"/>

m:MaterialTitle.description: Quick Floats - Quickly float things by adding the class left or right to the element. !important is used to avoid specificity issues.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Hiding Content
m:MaterialTitle.description: We provide easy to use classes to hide content on specific screen sizes.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Formatting
m:MaterialTitle.description: These classes help format various content on your site.
Truncation - To truncate long lines of text in an ellipsis, add the class truncate to the tag which contains the text. See an exaple below of a header being truncated inside a card.

m:MaterialLabel.text: This is an extremely long title that will be truncated

g:HTMLPanel.pre: <m:MaterialPanel shadow="1"> <m:MaterialLabel text="This is an extremely long title that will be truncated" addStyleNames="truncate" fontSize="2.5em"/> </m:MaterialPanel>
